author: Special Correspondent
title: Panel on lockdown exit strategy would submit report soon: Amarinder
description: Stay at home on Baisakhi, says CM as State reports 12 fresh cases
content:
Punjab on Sunday reported 12 fresh cases of COVID-19 taking the tally to 170, according to a government statement.
Also read: Coronavirus | Punjab extends curfew till May 1
The Health department said seven of the 12 cases were from the Jalandhar district an… [+1299 chars]
